languages.text: {n}Маражай лениво озирается, разглядывая ропщущую толпу. Его пальцы, еще секунду назад небрежно ласкавшие когтями ваше лицо, сползают вниз и чуть сжимаются на вашем горле.{/n} "Так-то ты следишь за своими слугами, мо{mf|й|я} звер{mf|ек|ушка}? Их дерзость оскорбляет меня. Убей одного из зачинщиков — мне на потеху".

{n}Marazhai looks around lazily, surveying the muttering crowd. His clawed fingers, which were idly caressing your face a moment ago, slide down and close loosely around your throat.{/n} "This is how you keep your servants in check, my little pet? Their insolence offends me. Kill one of the ringleaders — for my amusement."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай лениво озирается, разглядывая ропщущую толпу. Их дерзость оскорбляет меня. Убей одного из зачинщиков — мне на потеху".

Their insolence offends me. Kill one of the ringleaders — for my amusement."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋以懒洋洋的目光扫过窃窃私语的人群，尖利的爪子从你的脸上滑落，轻轻扼住了你的咽喉。{/n}“我的小宠物，你就是这样管教你的仆人的吗？我可受不了这样无礼的冒犯。杀掉其中一个领头的，让我开心开心。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around lazily, surveying the muttering crowd. His clawed fingers, which were idly caressing your face a moment ago, slide down and close loosely around your throat.{/n} "This is how you keep your servants in check, my little pet? Their insolence offends me. Kill one of the ringleaders — for my amusement."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋以懒洋洋的目光扫过窃窃私语的人群，尖利的爪子从你的脸上滑落，轻轻扼住了你的咽喉。{/n}“我的小宠物，你就是这样管教你的仆人的吗？我可受不了这样无礼的冒犯。杀掉其中一个领头的，让我开心开心。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mira lentamente en derredor, inspeccionando a la cuchicheante multitud. Las garras de sus dedos, que hasta ahora estaban acariciando distraídamente tu cara, se deslizan hacia abajo y se cierran en torno a tu garganta sin ejercer presión.{/n} «¿Así es como metes en cintura a tus sirvientes, mascota mía? Su insolencia me ofende. Mata a uno de los oficiales para divertirme».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around lazily, surveying the muttering crowd. His clawed fingers, which were idly caressing your face a moment ago, slide down and close loosely around your throat.{/n} "This is how you keep your servants in check, my little pet? Their insolence offends me. Kill one of the ringleaders — for my amusement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mira lentamente en derredor, inspeccionando a la cuchicheante multitud. Las garras de sus dedos, que hasta ahora estaban acariciando distraídamente tu cara, se deslizan hacia abajo y se cierran en torno a tu garganta sin ejercer presión.{/n} «¿Así es como metes en cintura a tus sirvientes, mascota mía? Su insolencia me ofende. Mata a uno de los oficiales para divertirme».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai porte son regard désinvolte sur la foule qui bruisse de murmures. Ses doigts griffus, qui caressaient distraitement votre visage quelques secondes plus tôt, se resserrent autour de votre gorge.{/n} « C'est ainsi que vous commandez vos serviteurs, {mf|mon brave petit|ma brave petite} esclave ? Leur insolence m'offense profondément. Tuez un des meneurs. J'ai envie de me divertir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around lazily, surveying the muttering crowd. His clawed fingers, which were idly caressing your face a moment ago, slide down and close loosely around your throat.{/n} "This is how you keep your servants in check, my little pet? Their insolence offends me. Kill one of the ringleaders — for my amusement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai porte son regard désinvolte sur la foule qui bruisse de murmures. Ses doigts griffus, qui caressaient distraitement votre visage quelques secondes plus tôt, se resserrent autour de votre gorge.{/n} « C'est ainsi que vous commandez vos serviteurs, {mf|mon brave petit|ma brave petite} esclave ? Leur insolence m'offense profondément. Tuez un des meneurs. J'ai envie de me divertir. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sieht sich träge um und mustert die murmelnde Menge. Mit seinen klauenartigen Fingern, die eben noch ruhig dein Gesicht liebkosten, fährt er nach unten und umschließt locker deine Kehle.{/n} "So haltet Ihr also Eure Diener in Schach, {mf|mein gehorsamer Ergebener|meine gehorsame Ergebene}? Ihre Unverschämtheit kränkt mich. Töte einen der Rädelsführer – zu meinem Vergnügen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around lazily, surveying the muttering crowd. His clawed fingers, which were idly caressing your face a moment ago, slide down and close loosely around your throat.{/n} "This is how you keep your servants in check, my little pet? Their insolence offends me. Kill one of the ringleaders — for my amusement."

Mit seinen klauenartigen Fingern, die eben noch ruhig dein Gesicht liebkosten, fährt er nach unten und umschließt locker deine Kehle.{/n} "So haltet Ihr also Eure Diener in Schach, {mf|mein gehorsamer Ergebener|meine gehorsame Ergebene}? Ihre Unverschämtheit kränkt mich. Töte einen der Rädelsführer – zu meinem Vergnügen."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはのんびりと周囲を見回し、呟く群衆を見渡す。先程まであなたの顔を撫でていた彼の指は、下に滑り落ち、あなたの喉のあたりをゆるく締める。{/n}「こいつがしもべどもを支配し続ける方法か、小さなペットよ？あいつらの傲慢な態度が俺を苛つかせるんだ。首謀者の1人を殺せ…俺の娯楽のためにな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around lazily, surveying the muttering crowd. His clawed fingers, which were idly caressing your face a moment ago, slide down and close loosely around your throat.{/n} "This is how you keep your servants in check, my little pet? Their insolence offends me. Kill one of the ringleaders — for my amusement."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, miskince etrafına bakarak mırıldanan kalabalığı inceliyor. Birkaç dakika önce yüzünü haylazlıkla okşayan pençeli parmakları, aşağı doğru kayarak gevşekçe boynunu kavrıyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârlarını böyle mi kontrol altında tutuyorsun minik hayvanım? Cüretkârlıkları beni gücendiriyor. Elebaşlarından birini öldür de... Keyfim yerine gelsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around lazily, surveying the muttering crowd. His clawed fingers, which were idly caressing your face a moment ago, slide down and close loosely around your throat.{/n} "This is how you keep your servants in check, my little pet? Their insolence offends me. Kill one of the ringleaders — for my amusement."
